title: NasNet Resolver Generator
description: Generate a Go GraphQL resolver following gqlgen patterns for apps/backend

name.description: The name of the resolver/resource (PascalCase recommended, e.g., 'Interface', 'DHCPLease')

module.description: The module/domain this resolver belongs to (e.g., 'network', 'firewall', 'system')
module.x-prompt: Which module should the resolver belong to?

dryRun.description: Preview file changes without writing to disk
